price: 76. Those who were arrogant said: "Verily, we disbelieve in that which you believe in."
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
